text: Manuel Mandel (30 September 1936 - 27 September 2009) was a Brazilian rower. He competed at the 1980 Summer Olympics and the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Brazilian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (city)
title: Manuel Mandel
